## Type

- [ ] New example
- [ ] Improvement to existing example
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Other

## Description

A clear description of what you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Why is this example/feature useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

If you have ideas for how this should work, describe them here.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've considered.

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information, screenshots, or references.
